Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I see...<sp:5:0:0>Please show me a picture some
other time, then.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I see...<sp:5:0:0> Well, if you change your mind,
please come talk to me.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh yes, and please take this too!<sp:5:0:0>
This dish is a stable specialty.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>What a superb picture!<sp:5:0:0> It's exactly what
I was hoping for!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have to tell you, <sp:5:0:0>this is the last of the
paintings to go up. With this bit of art,
all the stables have been decorated!
And from what I hear,<sp:5:0:0> it was you who
helped get pictures put on the walls of
the other stables, too, Link.
As a way of saying thanks for all your
help, I'd like to give you a gift from the
Stable Association. Please, take it.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>This is a nice picture, yes,<sp:5:0:0> but what I'd
like to hang on the wall is...different.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Appreciate the thought, but...<sp:5:0:0>it's not quite
the imagery I'm going for.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah, hold on,<sp:5:0:0> it doesn't seem like you have
room in your pouch.
Talk_100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I understand.<sp:5:0:0> The painting really is
wonderful. I'm happy to leave it as is.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I was thinking of sending five servings
of our stable's own <clr:0000>specialty dish<clr:ffff> with
you, but...
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This would really liven up the look around
here. <sp:5:0:0>Is it OK if I paint a copy?
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I was thinking of giving you a <clr:0000>diamond<clr:ffff>
from the Stable Association, but...
Talk_103:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Ah, Link.<sp:0:4:0>That stunning painting brightened up
the stable the moment it was hung on
the wall.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Now, just give me a moment to whip up a
reproduction. <sp:5:0:0>Haha, don't worry! I'm quite
good at this, I promise.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wonderful. Give me a moment to make
a copy.<sp:5:0:0> Don't worry, I'm quick with
the paintbrush!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, Link,<sp:5:0:0> has that <clr:0000>empty frame <clr:ffff>caught
your eye?
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Phew...finished!<sp:5:0:0> These pictures of yours
really are extraordinary, Link.

If you capture another one you like,
please don't hesitate to show it to me.
Talk_02:
Work in progress. Do not touch.
　　　　　　　　　　　　　   -The Proprietor
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I hate not being able to thank you
properly after you've done so much
for us.
I'll give you your gift once you've made
room to carry it. Just come see me when
you're ready.
Talk_107:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Ah, I know how you feel.<sp:5:0:0> That picture,
it's really something... It just stops you
in your tracks, doesn't it?
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, Link.<sp:5:0:0> Are you here to pick up your
reward for helping put pictures in the
stable frames?
Talk_108:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right, then.<sp:5:0:0> Sorry for pestering you.
Please enjoy your time at the stable.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I knew it! It's perfect for this stable!<sp:5:0:0>
And it's all thanks to you, Link.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh, but...<sp:5:0:0>it looks like your pouch is still
filled to the brim.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Yes, then here it is...a token to show
our thanks.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, <sp:5:1:0>Link! It looks like you've saved up
some Pony Points!

If you'd like to trade them in<clr:0000> for a reward<clr:ffff>,
please <clr:0000>head to the counter<clr:ffff>.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, Link,<sp:5:0:0> do you still have your eye on
that <clr:0000>empty frame<clr:ffff>?
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I was thinking I'd give you a <clr:0000>special dish<clr:ffff>
from our stable, but...
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thank you for a truly splendid picture.<sp:5:0:0>
Please, feel free to use the stable
whenever you want.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Aha!<sp:5:0:0> This is exactly the picture
I asked for!
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm happy to swap the painting in the
frame for a different one. If you have an
image you like, please just let me know!
Talk_95: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh, you don't want to change it, then?
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Stable Association has decided we
stable owners should display pictures on
our walls for the enjoyment of our guests.
They've advised us to start by hanging
up frames.

Yep, you'll find frames like this one here
on stable walls all across the land!
Talk_38:
To show my appreciation, I'm giving you
<clr:0000>one <clr:ffff>Pony Point.
Talk_96:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You want to switch out the picture,
do you? Can I see the new one first?
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry, Link.<sp:5:0:0> That's not quite what I
was looking for.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I wanted to give you our stable's most
recommended <clr:0000>elixir<clr:ffff>. It's especially useful
for travelers...but, well...
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes, and take this too! It's something a
traveler like you will find handy when
faced with harsh terrain and weather.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Oh, well, that's a shame.<sp:5:0:0> Without some
kind of picture for reference, there's no
way I can paint the scene I had in mind.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Speaking of pictures, there's this
researcher at Lookout Landing
named <clr:0000>Robbie<clr:ffff>.
He was saying he has this thing called a
<clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>. You can point it at scenery and
it makes a picture out of it.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Some folks come up with some pretty
incredible inventions, don't they?
Talk_99:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you.<sp:5:0:0> So I'll replace that picture
with this one, then?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We stable owners are going to be
putting paintings on display for
everyone to enjoy.
The Stable Association figured it'd be a
good idea for us to hang the frames first
to get ready.
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Link, have you ever heard the word
"<clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>" before?

I hear it's some gadget that can make a
picture out of whatever you point it at.
And it does it lightning fast too! 
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>This researcher at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>
knows all about it. Honestly though,
I'm not sure I believe it exists.
